This document analysis the sentiment of presential inauguration speeches.


```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
```


```{python}
df = pd.read_csv('data/df_concat.csv')
```


# Results

## Graphs

::: {.panel-tabset}

### Trump

This is the graph for Trump's speech sentiment.

```{python}
fig = px.bar_polar(df[df['source']=='Trump'], r="stars", theta="direction",
                   color="stars", 
                   hover_name="text", 
                   color_discrete_sequence= px.colors.sequential.Plasma_r
                   )   
fig.show()
```

### Biden

This is the graph for Biden's speech sentiment.

```{python}
fig = px.bar_polar(df[df['source']=='Biden'], r="stars", theta="direction",
                   color="stars", 
                   hover_name="text", 
                   color_discrete_sequence= px.colors.sequential.Plasma_r
                   )
fig.show()
```

:::

list(zip(df_trump['text'], df_trump['stars']))
